唔係同一句cite好多個reference落去，而係耐唔耐就有一句係有cite reference咁解，我驚你誤會⋯⋯

Example：假設你份功課係講XXX BAKERY嘅analysis
According to the ___ experiment conducted by XXX in 1999^1, it is found that scent is an influential element encouraging customers to visit a shop, which implies the competitive advantage of XXX Bakery with the smell of bread drifting from the shop for improving the customer flow consistently so as the sales volume.

1係嗰份reference，求其用keywords search到個title差唔多嘅journal即可

紅字：成份功課經常有呢d cite reference嘅句子，改功課嘅人一見到呢d有cite嘢嘅sentence就會好high，覺得你有料到，十幾廿個reference走唔甩
